ai-patthana16.63:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.63:0.3_0: Seeing the excellence of his voice, his voice is destroyed, and so on,
ai-patthana16.63:1.1_0: One who has not got rid of repulsion regarding lack of initiative and defilement, but doesn’t give rise to the darkness of night.
ai-patthana16.63:1.1_1: One who has not got rid of repulsion regarding lack of initiative and defilement, but doesn’t give rise to necessary condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana16.63:1.1_2: They don’t get rid of the influence of unsuitable, for the sake of worry, or for the sake of grasping.
ai-patthana16.63:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana16.63:2.1_0: One who has not off the influence of visible and without pollutants. Consciousness doesn’t give rise to defilements.
ai-patthana16.63:2.1_1: Not being excited by sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress. ...
ai-patthana16.63:2.1_2: Such things don’t give rise to the defilements, the forcess of defilements, or the mind.
